cancelOwnershipHandover().details: Cancels the two-step ownership handover to the caller, if any.

completeOwnershipHandover(address).details: Allows the owner to complete the two-step ownership handover to `pendingOwner`. Reverts if there is no existing ownership handover requested by `pendingOwner`.

owner().details: Returns the owner of the contract.

ownershipHandoverExpiresAt(address).details: Returns the expiry timestamp for the two-step ownership handover to `pendingOwner`.

permit2TransferAndMulticall(address,((ad.details: msg.value will persist across all calls in the multicall. If leftover ETH is expected         as part of the multicall, be sure to set refundTo to the expected recipient. If the multicall         includes ERC721/ERC1155 mints or transfers, be sure to set nftRecipient to the expected recipient.

params.nftRecipient: The address to set as recipient of ERC721/ERC1155 mints
params.refundTo: The address to refund any leftover ETH to

permitTransferAndMulticall((address,addr.details: Approved spender must be address(this) to transfer user's tokens to the RelayRouter. If leftover ETH         is expected as part of the multicall, be sure to set refundTo to the expected recipient. If the multicall         includes ERC721/ERC1155 mints or transfers, be sure to set nftRecipient to the expected recipient.

params.nftRecipient: The address to set as recipient of ERC721/ERC1155 mints
params.refundTo: The address to refund any leftover ETH to

returns.returnData: The return data from the multicall

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the owner to renounce their ownership.

requestOwnershipHandover().details: Request a two-step ownership handover to the caller. The request will automatically expire in 48 hours (172800 seconds) by default.

params._permit2: The address of the Permit2 contract

params._router: The address of the router contract

transferAndMulticall(address[],uint256[].details: This contract must be approved to transfer msg.sender's tokens to the RelayRouter. If leftover ETH         is expected as part of the multicall, be sure to set refundTo to the expected recipient. If the multicall         includes ERC721/ERC1155 mints or transfers, be sure to set nftRecipient to the expected recipient.

params.amounts: An array of token amounts to transfer
params.nftRecipient: The address to set as recipient of ERC721/ERC1155 mints
params.refundTo: The address to refund any leftover ETH to
params.tokens: An array of token addresses to transfer

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the owner to transfer the ownership to `newOwner`.

permit2TransferAndMulticall(address,((ad.notice: Use Permit2 to transfer tokens to RelayRouter and perform an arbitrary multicall.         Pass in an empty permitSignature to only perform the multicall.

permitTransferAndMulticall((address,addr.notice: Use ERC2612 permit to transfer tokens to RelayRouter and execute multicall in a single tx

router().notice: The address of the router contract

transferAndMulticall(address[],uint256[].notice: Transfer tokens to RelayRouter and perform multicall in a single tx

withdraw().notice: Withdraw function in case funds get stuck in contract
